title: Sheriff David Clarke: The War On Police Is Fueled by President Obama and the “Black Lies Matter “movement.
text: Milwaukee County Sheriff David Clarke joined Leslie Gold to discuss the murder of Harris County Sheriff's Deputy Darren Goforth last Friday. Listen here: Sheriff Clarke takes issue with President Obama and what he calls the "Black Lies Matter" movement for fueling the anti
